data.title: Green Movies - The Indianapolis Public Library
data.meta_description: Green Movies by IndyPL_AdamT - a staff-created list : Here is a non-comprehensive list of movies with the word green (in some form) in their titles. #indypladults
data.text:
This film starring John Wayne is based on a novel by Robin Moore. This film starring John Wayne is based on a novel by Robin Moore. Show less

The Green Inferno is a horror movie that is not for the faint of heart. Even hardcore horror fans may find the gore in this film difficult to stomach.
